meanings.sent1: The burbot swam gracefully in the river.
meanings.sent2: I caught a burbot while fishing at the lake.
meanings.sent3: Why did the burbot bring a fishing rod to the party?

meanings.sent1: We decided to burbot in the early morning.

meanings.definition: The flesh of the burbot, used as food.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious dish using burbot.
meanings.sent2: Burbot is a popular choice for seafood lovers.
meanings.sent3: The burbot fillet was so fresh, it practically swam onto my plate!

meanings.sent5: She savored every bite of the tender burbot meat, savoring its delicate flavor.
